release_note: iOS 17 compatibility
We removed the support for Dictation Hub. Please use the other sending options of the app instead to share your dictations.
Bugfix: Crash on iOS 16 after repeated recording and pausing
Added iOS 15 support Bugfix: Dictations lost from Express mode when the recording is interrupted by an incoming call Bugfix: Incoming calls make the dictation file corrupt when encryption is enabled

The SpeechLive integration of the Philips Voice Recorder app will be discontinued end of September. Please send your dictations to SpeechLive and they will be available in the new app: https: apps.apple.com us app philips speechlive id1503474163
Email addresses are supported in Author field
iOS 14 Bugfixes: Missing Edit button in Details screen Crash during SpeechLive trial signup General iOS 12 no longer supported

5 custom fields for additional metadata Deactivation of the automatic purge functionality for free sending options Support of email addresses with new top level domains

A dedicated button to simply create new recordings Configurable action bar that allows you accessing your desired functions on the main screen Cut feature to get rid of useless sequences in your recording 5 different winding speeds Philips SpeechExec Enterprise support. Send your recordings to your SpeechExec workflow. Automatic sending in case one sending option is enabled A new walk through guide to help you getting started more quickly

Product name changed to Philips voice recorder No 30 day limitation SpeechLive banner and tutorial videos Easy in app SpeechLive trial signup Support for Philips remote device manager Email field in mobile server settings has been removed Encryption key requires now 4 16 characters
support for the new speech recognition languages

New UserInterface New Quick Start Guide New barcode scanner SDK Editing mode can be set as default Clearer settings structure Email sending can be enabled as additional sending option Limit free usage to 30 days Display title of recording in Philips SpeechExec title column General bugfixing

Improvements for iOS6

Redesigned user interface Audio files can be sent to up to 5 different Philips SpeechExec Mobile Servers Send audio files via email. Only AAC audio format is supported. Attach a photo to every audio file New menu structure for settings Launch Philips Dictation Recorder from your own iPhone app and transfer up to 4 different keywords that will get visible in the audio file s details. New audio file details screen with integrated audio player. Connect to Philips Dictation Recorder via your webbrowser to playback or download your audio files.

Redesigned user interface Audio files can be sent to up to 5 different Philips SpeechExec Mobile Servers Send audio files via email. Only AAC audio format is supported. Attach a photo to every audio file New menu structure for settings Launch Philips Dictation Recorder from your own iPhone app and transfer up to 4 different keywords that will get visible in the audio file s details. New audio file details screen with integrated audio player. Connect to Philips Dictation Recorder via your webbrowser to playback or download your audio files.

Solved Issues: 1. In the XML File there s still 1.0 as SpeechExecDictation version instead of 1.1. In this version 1.2 is written in the XML file. 2. Change language of your iPhone for example to German. Send a dictation to a https server. Following message occurs: kUnstrustedCertTitle kUnstrustedCertMessage Abbrechen or kIgnore 3. Unsecured certificate pops up altough sending dictations to a secure webserver via https even if the application already accepted the unsecure certificate the mentioned message pops up every time the application is restarted kill app by double click on home button 4. It is not possible to cancel a sending process when tapping on Cancel in the Untrusted Certificate window.

This version fixes the following issues: iPad2 cannot not upload dictation files When user accidentally selects passcode in the setting area without entering a 4 digit number the application is locked HTTPS data transfer not possible
